story.title: Our Journey
content: Mayouš (pronounced "May-yâu-sh", IPA: /majˈou̯ʃ/) is a premium shirt brand developed by Thanh Viet specifically for the Czech market. The name Mayouš draws inspiration from the popular Czech name "Matouš" (Matthew), creating a familiar and appealing connection with local consumers.

The "May" element carries dual meanings: in Vietnamese, "may" refers to sewing and garment making, the core business of the company. Simultaneously, "May" also evokes the image of clouds, representing the softness, lightness, and airiness that characterize the Tencel, Cotton, and Gracell blend fabrics and Vietnamese textiles.

The suffix "-ouš" in Czech is often used as a term of endearment, creating a sense of attachment and affection for customers in the Czech Republic. The name Mayouš thus represents not just a fashion brand but a symbol of gentleness, comfort, and affection, emphasizing the care and refinement in each product.

With our slogan "Light as breeze, green with ease," we emphasize both the comfort of our fabrics and our commitment to environmental sustainability. From Vietnam to Czechia, we bring the finest craftsmanship and eco-friendly practices to create shirts that not only look good but feel good to wear and are good for the planet.

At Mayouš, we believe that fashion should be both beautiful and responsible. Our shirts are designed for the modern professional who values quality, comfort, and sustainability. Each shirt is crafted with care, using premium materials that are gentle on the skin and the environment.

Our journey from Vietnam to Czechia represents our commitment to bringing the best of Vietnamese craftsmanship to the European market. We are proud of our heritage and excited to share our passion for quality and sustainability with our customers in the Czech Republic and beyond.

transparency.title: Transparency

company.title: About Our Company
description: Thanh Viet Limited Liability Company is a private enterprise operating in the field of garment production and business, specializing in high-end office shirts. Thanh Viet is proud to be one of the leading enterprises in the field of production and business of office fashion in Vietnam.

After more than a decade of formation and development, Thanh Viet has gradually affirmed its solid position in the domestic market thanks to clear product orientation, elegant design, premium materials, and especially the commitment to sustainable fashion.

With the criteria "Wear lightly, Live elegantly, Choose sustainably", Thanh Viet not only focuses on the aesthetic value and comfort of the wearer but also deeply cares about the environmentally friendly factor in the entire production chain, from input materials to product packaging.

facilities.title: Our Facilities
description: The headquarters of the enterprise is located on Dinh Nghi Xuan Street, Binh Tri Dong Ward, Binh Tan District, Ho Chi Minh City. This location is only about an hour's drive from Cat Lai Port, which is a great advantage in transporting goods, helping to shorten delivery time and optimize logistics costs.

The company's campus has a total area of more than 5,700m², including production areas and office areas that are scientifically planned and synchronized. Internal roads allow trucks weighing up to 10 tons to circulate easily, convenient for large-scale import and export activities.

The production area is equipped with a fire protection system that meets standards, modern machinery lines, and a safe, clean working environment. The office area consists of two floors, solidly built, with an airy design with many functional rooms serving management, administration, and product research and development activities.

production.title: Production Capacity
description: Thanh Viet currently has the ability to supply tens of thousands of shirt products each month to the domestic market through retail and wholesale distribution systems in major provinces and cities stretching from North to South such as Hanoi, Bac Ninh, Bac Giang, Phu Tho, Vinh Phuc, Nam Dinh, Thanh Hoa, Nghe An, Ha Tinh, Da Nang, Ho Chi Minh City, Can Tho.

With modern production lines, skilled human resources, and strict quality control, the company always ensures delivery schedule, product uniformity, and flexibility in adjusting models according to market needs.

With a sustainable development orientation, Thanh Viet sets a vision to become a leading textile and garment brand in Vietnam in the high-quality office fashion segment, reaching out to the international market, especially in countries belonging to the European Union (EU).

The enterprise is committed to pursuing the mission of providing products that are not only beautiful in form but also green, clean, and safe, contributing to elevating the Vietnamese textile and garment industry on the world fashion map.
